io.jsonwebtoken

Interface CompressionCodec

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCompressionCodec, DeflateCompressionCodec, GzipCompressionCodec

    public interface CompressionCodec
    Compresses and decompresses byte arrays according to a compression algorithm.
    Since:
    0.6.0
    See Also:
    DeflateCompressionCodec, GzipCompressionCodec

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] compress(byte[] payload)
      Compresses the specified byte array according to the compression algorithm.
      byte[] decompress(byte[] compressed)
      Decompresses the specified compressed byte array according to the compression algorithm.
      String getAlgorithmName()
      The algorithm name to use as the JWT's calg header value.

    • Method Detail

      • getAlgorithmName

        String getAlgorithmName()
        The algorithm name to use as the JWT's calg header value.
        Returns:
        the algorithm name to use as the JWT's calg header value.

      • compress

        byte[] compress(byte[] payload)
         throws CompressionException
        Compresses the specified byte array according to the compression algorithm.
        Parameters:
        payload - bytes to compress
        Returns:
        compressed bytes
        Throws:
        CompressionException - if the specified byte array cannot be compressed according to the compression algorithm.

      • decompress

        byte[] decompress(byte[] compressed)
           throws CompressionException
        Decompresses the specified compressed byte array according to the compression algorithm. The specified byte array must already be in compressed form according to the algorithm.
        Parameters:
        compressed - compressed bytes
        Returns:
        decompressed bytes
        Throws:
        CompressionException - if the specified byte array cannot be decompressed according to the compression algorithm.
